archdesc.runner: Special Collections, University of Virginia Library

did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections, University of Virginia Library
did.unittitle:
Office of the Dean of Students Office Administrative Files
1982-2000

accessrestrict.head: Access
accessrestrict.p: Access restrictions apply to personally identifiable student records under the terms of the Family Educational Rights and Privacy Act (F.E.R.P.A.).

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Office of the Dean of Students Office Administrative Files, Accession #RG-18/2/1.011, Special Collections, University of Virginia Library, Charlottesville, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: This collection was transferred to the library on 2001 November 29.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: Topical files from Dean Robert T. Canevari's and Dean Penny Rue's office, including the files of the V. Shamim Sisson, Associate Dean of Students.

arrangement.head: Organization
arrangement.p:
Series I: Dean of Students-Canevari/Rue, 1982-2000 Boxes 1-14
Series II: Assistant Dean-Sisson, 1990-2001 Boxes 15-17
Series III: Restricted Files Boxes 18-19
